data.description: This 310-acre farm, with 278 workable acres and 178.24 kilograms of saleable quota, offers an attractive agricultural operation. The two farms are conveniently located across the road from each other, facilitating cropping and manure spreading. The land features Guelph Loam soil with systematic tiling, making it highly productive. The farm includes a beautifully renovated 4-bedroom stone farmhouse with a modern kitchen. The barns, built between 2004 and 2021, house a high-producing herd managed by Lely robots. The entire herd is housed under one roof, including an enclosed calf barn within the main barn, making it a well-equipped dairy operation.
